content: Just in case someone from the BADCamp Training is monitoring this, I'm trying to get reconnected in Zoom. I need someone to let me back in. Thanks! Tim C.

Hi, tkcent. Welcome to the Backdrop CMS community on Zulip. I'm your friendly neighborhood Dragonbot. Try '@Dragonbot help' for a list of things I can help you with. There are lots of friendly humans that hang around here, so please feel free to ask questions.

Here is a short (3 min) video to help you navigate Zulip. https://youtu.be/DN8YL2MrsSU
@tkcent I will help if you still need it.
I'm back in. Thanks anyway!
@tkcent - It was me. I logged in and then admitted you.
Enjoy
Thank you @StPaulTim
@jenlampton Unfortunately, I missed the BADCamp Mini Camp Thursday. Do you know when the video will be posted?

@Jeff Porten I'm not sure how many sections of the summit were recorded, but I did the exact same upgrade demo in this presentation: https://www.jenlampton.com/presentations/drupalcamp-colorado/moving-drupal-7-backdrop-cms

@jenlampton We're already on Backdrop so I'm not sure if an upgrade video is valuable—was hoping to pick up tips and pointers from the second day, though. Unless that's when you did the upgrade demo? In any case, my bad for missing it—I'll see if it shows up in the recordings.
I'm not sure if anything was recorded.
@oadaeh (Jason Flatt) I think they're recording the regular sessions, but I have no idea about Wednesday or Thursday.
Right, those days were left up to the individuals to decide that, and I don't remember anyone saying they were recording.
@oadaeh (Jason Flatt) Fair enough. I'll just hop in my TARDIS, then.
@Jeff Porten I'm not sure how much was recorded, but I posted links to similar talks for all the topics at https://2020.badcamp.org/summit/backdrop-cms-summit
If there was something you were specifically inerested in from the schedule, there is likely video content for it somewhere :)
I'm also doing a BOF on Backdrop now at BadCamp :) https://app.hopin.to/events/badcamp-2020-sessions/sessions/b26b4fc3-12eb-4301-84b1-432f3d94509d

jenlampton said:

If there was something you were specifically inerested in from the schedule, there is likely video content for it somewhere :)

Yeah, there's just tons of stuff that I've watched and forgotten, and then ran out of time to keep up with.

jenlampton said:

I'm also doing a BOF on Backdrop now at BadCamp :) https://app.hopin.to/events/badcamp-2020-sessions/sessions/b26b4fc3-12eb-4301-84b1-432f3d94509d

Well, crap, heading there now!
Firefox closed the window, and now I can't get back in.
@oadaeh (Jason Flatt) my battery died :( I think I can't get back in because the bof is over?
Yeah, I think that was it. Hopin said it ended at 1:45, and what was available was the BOF that started at 2.
